獉獉獉

獉字的基本解释

獉
zhēn
〔獉狉（
同“榛”③。p?）〕草木丛杂，野兽出没的原始景象，如“若以中国师徒，委之波涛漂渺之中，拘之风土獉獉之地，真乃入于幽谷。”

獉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhēn］
［《廣韻》側詵切，平臻，莊。］
亦作“樼1”。亦作“獉1”。
(1)果木名。落叶灌木或小乔木，叶子互生，圆卵形或倒卵形，春日开花，雌雄同株，雄花黄褐色，雌花紅紫色，实如栗，可食用或榨油。
(2)特指其果实。
(3)丛木。
(4)草木丛生貌。亦以形容荒废，衰败。

獉字的康熙字典解释
獉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
獉字的起名意思

暂无。

Dog
Basic explanation of words
Dog
zhēn
〔獉狉(
Same as "Hazel" ③. p?)] The primordial sights of vegetation and wild beasts, such as "If you take the Chinese mentor and apprentice, in the midst of the waves, you will be in a valley in the land of the customs and the scorpions."
Dog
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhēn］
["Guangyun" side-cut, Pingzhen, Zhuang. ]
Also known as "樼1". Also known as "Jan 1".
(1) The name of the fruit tree. Deciduous shrubs or small trees, alternate leaves, round or obovate, blooming in spring, monoecious, male flowers yellowish brown, female flowers red-purple, like chestnuts, edible or squeezed oil.
(2) Especially refers to its fruit.
(3) Cong Mu.
(4) The appearance of dense vegetation. It is also used to describe waste and decline.
Dog
